name: DNA Polymerization
description:
This game was made for the February 2023 bitsy jam (https://itch.io/jam/bitsy-70-chain-reaction). Made using Bitsy (https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy).

This is my first ever game! I also spent less than 24 hours on it so it definitely isn't a masterpiece.

In this game, you are a DNA Polymerase collecting nucleotides to fix DNA. The premise of the game is not completely scientifically accurate, but the facts inside are!

Enjoy!
